query: MERGE (make:InteractiveField {name: 'Make', type: 'Option Button', option:'Audi, BMW, Ford, Honda, Mazda, Mercedes Benz, Nissan, Opel, Porche, Renault, Skoda, Suzuki, Toyota, Volkswagen, Volvo', description:'User should select only one of the vehicle brands from the provided Make option list.'}) MERGE (engine:InteractiveField {name: 'Engine Performance[kw]', type: 'Text Field', description:'User should provide their vehicle engine performance information, the information type should be integer.'}) MERGE (dateOfManufacture:InteractiveField {name: 'Date of Manufacture', type: 'Option Button', option:'A digital calendar interface with options to select specific day for the month, and there will be navigation arrows on the sides to allow users switch to another month back and forth.', description:'User should provide their vehicle manufacture day, the day information should be today or somewhere in the past.'}) MERGE (numberOfSeat:InteractiveField {name: 'Number of Seats', type: 'Option Button', option:'1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9', description:'User should provide information regarding the number of seats for their vehicle. The value should be a one from the option list.'}) MERGE (fuelType:InteractiveField {name: 'Fuel Type', type: 'Option Button', option:'Petrol, Diesel, Electric Power, Gas, Other', description:'User should provide information regarding the fuel type of their vehicle. The value should be a one from the option list.'}) MERGE (listPrice:InteractiveField {name: 'List Price[$]', type: 'Text Field', option:'Petrol, Diesel, Electric Power, Gas, Other', description:'User should provide information regarding their vehicle price.'}) MERGE (licensePlateNumber:InteractiveField {name: 'License Plate Number', type: 'Text Field', description:'It is optional information, User can decide if they want to provide their vehicle license plate number.'}) MERGE (annualMileager:InteractiveField {name: 'Annual Mileage[mi]', type: 'Text Field', description:'User should provide information regarding the Annual mileage of their vehicle.'}) MERGE (next:InteractiveField {name: 'Next', type: 'Redirect Button', description:'If user click this button, the page will direct to automobileEnterInsurantData page.'}) MERGE (make)-[:REQUIRED_INFOR]->(automobileEnterVehicleData) MERGE (engine)-[:REQUIRED_INFOR]->(automobileEnterVehicleData) MERGE (dateOfManufacture)-[:REQUIRED_INFOR]->(automobileEnterVehicleData) MERGE (numberOfSeat)-[:REQUIRED_INFOR]->(automobileEnterVehicleData) MERGE (fuelType)-[:REQUIRED_INFOR]->(automobileEnterVehicleData) MERGE (listPrice)-[:REQUIRED_INFOR]->(automobileEnterVehicleData) MERGE (licensePlateNumber)-[:OPTIONAL_INFOR]->(automobileEnterVehicleData) MERGE (annualMileager)-[:REQUIRED_INFOR]->(automobileEnterVehicleData)  MERGE (next)-[:REDIRECTION_TO]->(automobileEnterInsurantData)
